Perform Hierarchical Clustering on the dataset cleaned in PCA_Total.rmd
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
df_f <- read.csv("TrainTestDatasets/Train_CaseFatality_PCA.csv")
df_i <- read.csv("TrainTestDatasets/Train_Incident_PCA.csv")
```

```{r}
numeric_cols_f <- sapply(df_f, is.numeric)
clusters <- hclust(dist(subset(df_f[numeric_cols_f], select = -c(Case_Fatality_Ratio, Incident_Rate, Confirmed, Deaths, Total_Test_Results, Testing_Rate))))
plot(clusters)
```

```{r}
numeric_cols_i <- sapply(df_i, is.numeric)
clusters2 <- hclust(dist(subset(df_i[numeric_cols_i], select = -c(Case_Fatality_Ratio, Incident_Rate, Confirmed, Deaths, Total_Test_Results, Testing_Rate))))
plot(clusters2)

```
